Description:
IN served -Failed to put in place suitable health surveillance for your employees that are exposed to powder sprays, namely EN600v/25KG and SN805G/20KG, that are respiratory and/or skin sensitisers exposure to  which can cause occupational asthma and/or dermatitis. 
PN served - You do not have effective measures in place to prevent or adequately control exposure to DCM and Hydrofluoric acid
